title: The Cure
description: Welcome to Metravā.The year is 3433.Here are some things you need to know:Run by the governmental body, Peār, Metravā is inhabited by U-mans, a genetically modified race of humans who do not sleep, who work fifteen hours a daāy, and who are fused with their U-chip at birth.Everyone is the same, everyone blends in, and no one stands out.That is until Knijä Taū is born.
author: J.R.  Knight
